attributes.action: Look at cutting import duty tax on petrol and diesel
attributes.background: Look at cutting import duty by 20p+ per litre to make it affordable for the public until fuel prices start to stabilise in the UK. This will make it affordable for the general public and allow them to continue to work, socialise and live their lives to some degree of normality in an uncertain world.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action:

Temporarily suspend all taxes on all fuels and energy bills
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610585
